moves.1. e4: Let this serve as a warning to those who would quit on games early in, to save their ratings. It doesn't always work. Jonny let's the clock run out after move 4, after suffering a slight setback. The game is rated.
moves.1... e6 2. d4: Central pawns. This is how you do it.
moves.4. Nxd4: He dies, and lets the clock run out, probably hoping the game would not wind up rated, but it is, and he's lost a game official and on the record due more to cowardice than ineptitude. Take that, Jonny97!

gameName: Jonny learns running out the clock doesn't always work.
